name: Outsourcify
tagline: Bangkok-based Web Development and Design Agency
description:
Outsourcify is a web design and development web agency based in Thailand
We create websites, applications and mobile apps for customers worldwide. Our team has project managers peaking English, French, Swedish and Thai to enhance the work process and enforce quality control.
We have a large portfolio of customers from all parts of the world, France, Sweden, Singapore, Australia, Belgium, Denmark, Thailand. We often work as a contractor for western design agencies that outsource their web development to our team, we also work on projects for direct customers as well as in-house start-up projects.
We focus on open sources technologies in the following areas : front-end web development (HTML5/javascript), WordPress integration, e-commerce websites, custom PHP web apps development with the Symfony framework, single-page javascript web applications with Vue.JS, Angular JS or React JS, mobile applications with React Native
Outsourcify Co. Ltd. is a BOI approved company created by Thai, French and Swedish partners, with currently have a team of more than 30 web designers and developers working in our Bangkok (Asoke) office that bring their expertise, energy, and professionalism to every project.
